statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;

SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND price > 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT stock_quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY name;
SELECT report_name, details FROM reports WHERE LENGTH(details) > 100;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE products.price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY orders.quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%GmbH';
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_contact ORDER BY order_count DESC;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products

SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT purchase_date, quantity_purchased, total_cost FROM purchases WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE stock_level <= 10;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, unit_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
